text: muck isn't really good until 5 swamps. At 4 swamps it's basically a dark ritual. 5 nets you 3 mana. This is assuming no mana rocks. In this deck you have the option of double casting it with no real cost, if commander was out at start of turn. So four lands can produce 7 mana and 5 will produce 10 mana. Maybe worth considering, but seems subpar.
wow i've never seen [[koskun falls]]. It's weird that it's a world enchantment though. Usually they reference all players, not just the player that played it.

attachments.text:
World Enchantment

if you've ever played with it, you'll know that it usually gets 2 things almost all the time. The first time they sacrifice it usually goes on a creature. Then they just kill the creature to end the loop
Opponents are going to feel bad playing removal on a clunky aura. Especially if you play a bigger target
Could wreck a mono Red or black deck
That said, seems easy enough to put it on a creature to sacrifice.
